title: Protecting Blaze's Mark
description: Raven I’ve been on a ride through hell and back with Blaze at myside. We’ve taken on more than anyone could bear. Now here we are with our world being tossed into the fire and it’s time to for us to protect ourselves once again. This time I’m clouded by my own fears that come arise. I only hope I can withstand the flames when they come for us this time around. Either way, I refuse to let anything happen to my children or the man who keeps me grounded.
author: E.C. Land
